preference.name: SUBSCMPL_msd_include_pdf
preference.preference_description: Decides the type of documents sent to vendors on material susbtance declaration requests. This preference is applicable for IPC 1752-2v1.1 format file type only. The file format is specified by the preference "SUBSCMPL_request_msd_format". Valid values are: * true: A blank IPC standard PDF document is sent to vendors. * false: No IPC standard PDF document is sent to the vendors. This is the default value.
